name: Good luck, Himeko!
description:
Hello!٩(๑>∀<๑)۶ My name is Himeko, and it's going to be a biggest day for me in high school! Do you want to know what it is~? (*´艸`*)♡

The truth is.... I have a B I G crush on one of my classmates! (*//艸//)♡

I have tried to gather courage to confess to them, and... Today is the day I'll finally do it! (,,> <,,)♡

Will you help me gather the courage for it? Tehe~ (๑´ڡ`๑)✧*｡

-- 

Use A&D to navigate through school and SPACE to jump

Gather the hearts to gain courage, and help Himeko confess her love!
